channel.title: Web Components on Fireship
channel.description: Recent content in Web Components on Fireship

item.title: Angular Elements Guide
item.description: It is exciting to finally see the adoption of web components going mainstream. There are many tools available for building them, but none can match the power and stability of Angular Elements. The following lesson will provide a handful of useful techniques aimed at building complex production-ready custom elements. In addition to this post, check out these resources: Manfred Steyer’s Angular Elements Series Sam Julian’s Getting Started with Angular Elements Nrwl’s Five Reasons to Use Angular Elements Angular Elements QuickStart Rendering without Zone.
